> <OLD>
>
> WHEELIE nodded up at the larger-than-usual group of DINOBOTS he was used to
> interacting with.  Gesturing over at BACKSTOP, the small mechanoid said
> quietly, "Can you say what is going on?  I still have not heard a story of
> what is wrong.  How did GRIMLOCK and them all get down here?"  He had not
> seen his 'friends' since the end of the GREAT WAR and the final battles
> between AUTOBOT and DECEPTICON, before the GREAT REFORMATTING had taken
> place and most had been UPGRADED to MAXIMAL and PREDACON.
>
> So how had GRIMLOCK and his team gotten sent several hundred vorns over into
> the past, to the BEAST WARS?

BACKSTOP was still looking over at GRIMLOCK and the other DINOBOTS,
his expression both elated and yet confused.

"The story, if told in its entirety would be quite long." BACKSTOP
said as he turned his attention to WHEELIE, "You see Grimlock used to
work with me in the diplomatic corp . . . ." He paused for a moment as
if he didn't want to admit the next part, " . . . as did Magmatron."

BACKSTOP waved his hand to forestall any objections to this story,
"Yes, I know, everyone knows Magamtron was a Decepticon general, but
he came to see that the only way for Cybertron was to survive was to
stop the war." BACKSTOP frowned, "At least that's what I thought,
until he showed he had his own agenda."

GRIMLOCK shook his head, "Me Grimlock starting to remember. Dinobots
know Magmatron."

Looking at GRIMLOCK there was a nod from BACKSTOP, "Of course, since
after the war you worked for Magmatron, even after his defection."

(TAG)

- Preston
